application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Part two storey rear infill extension, a first floor rear extension incorporating two rooflights, reconfiguration of existing single storey rear extension, and installation of one rooflight to rear roof slope.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings:

20-258-LP (Location Plan); 20-258-SP Rev A (Site Plan); 20-258-BP (Block Plan)20-258-01 (Existing Plans); 20-258-02 Rev A (Existing Elevations); 20-258-20 Rev F (Proposed Plans); 20-258-21 Rev F (Proposed Elevations);
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the plans as listed in Condition (2).

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B, 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2, 2.1 and 2.10, policies GG1, D3, D4, D5, and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), and the Ealing Town Centre Conservation Area Management Plan (2007)
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.

| The proposed side facing window to the first-floor shall be obscure glazed non-opening unless the parts of the window which can be opened are more than 1.7 metres above the floor of the room in which the window is installed.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
| The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
